text: "As It Was" is a song by English singer Harry Styles and is the lead single from his third studio album Harry's House. It was released on 1 April 2022 by Columbia Records. The song was written by Styles alongside producers Kid Harpoon and Tyler Johnson. The song became a worldwide hit, topping the charts in 45 countries. It was nominated for 4 Grammy Awards in 2023. Category:2022 songs Category:Harry Styles songs
title: As It Was
